02248                                   addrinfo->ai_addr,
02249                                   addrinfo->ai_addrlen,
02250                                   0);
02251     }
02252     if (newface != NULL) {
02253         newface->flags |= CCN_FACE_PERMANENT;
02254         result = ccn_charbuf_create();
02255         face_instance->action = NULL;
02256         face_instance->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
02257         face_instance->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
02258         face_instance->faceid = newface->faceid;
02259         face_instance->lifetime = 0x7FFFFFFF;
02260         res = ccnb_append_face_instance(result, face_instance);
02261         if (res < 0)
02262             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&result);
02263     }    
02264 Finish:
02265     h->flood = save; /* restore saved flood flag */
02266     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face_instance);
02267     if (addrinfo != NULL)
02268         freeaddrinfo(addrinfo);
02269     return(result);
02270 }
02271 
02272 /**
02273  * @brief Process a destroyface request for the ccnd internal client.
02274  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02275  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a FaceInstance
02276             in its Content.
02277  * @param size is its size in bytes
02278  * @result on success the returned charbuf holds a new ccnd-encoded
02279  *         FaceInstance including faceid;
02280  *         returns NULL for any error.
02281  *
02282  * Is is an error if the face does not exist.
02283  */
02284 struct ccn_charbuf *
02285 ccnd_req_destroyface(struct ccnd_handle *h, const unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
02286 {
02287     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02288     int res;
02289     int at = 0;
02290     const unsigned char *req;
02291     size_t req_size;
02292     struct ccn_charbuf *result = NULL;
02293     struct ccn_face_instance *face_instance = NULL;
02294     struct face *reqface = NULL;
02295 
02296     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
02297     if (res < 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02298     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
02299     if (res < 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02300     face_instance = ccn_face_instance_parse(req, req_size);
02301     if (face_instance == NULL) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02302     if (face_instance->action == NULL) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02303     if (strcmp(face_instance->action, "destroyface") != 0)
02304         { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02305     if (face_instance->ccnd_id_size == sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) {
02306         if (memcmp(face_instance->ccnd_id, h->ccnd_id, sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) != 0)
02307             { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02308     }
02309     else if (face_instance->ccnd_id_size |= 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02310     if (face_instance->faceid == 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02311     /* consider the source ... */
02312     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
02313     if (reqface == NULL) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02314     if ((reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02315     res = ccnd_destroy_face(h, face_instance->faceid);
02316     if (res < 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02317     result = ccn_charbuf_create();
02318     face_instance->action = NULL;
02319     face_instance->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
02320     face_instance->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
02321     face_instance->lifetime = 0;
02322     res = ccnb_append_face_instance(result, face_instance);
02323     if (res < 0) {
02324         at = __LINE__;
02325         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&result);
02326     }
02327 Finish:
02328     if (at != 0)
02329         ccnd_msg(h, "ccnd_req_destroyface failed (line %d, res %d)", at, res);
02330     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face_instance);
02331     return(result);
02332 }
02333 
02334 /**
02335  * Worker bee for two very similar public functions.
02336  */
02337 static struct ccn_charbuf *
02338 ccnd_req_prefix_or_self_reg(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02339                    const unsigned char *msg, size_t size, int selfreg)
02340 {
02341     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02342     int res;
02343     const unsigned char *req;
02344     size_t req_size;
02345     struct ccn_charbuf *result = NULL;
02346     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry = NULL;
02347     struct face *face = NULL;
02348     struct face *reqface = NULL;
02349     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = NULL;
02350 
02351     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
02352     if (res < 0)
02353         goto Finish;        
02354     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
02355     if (res < 0)
02356         goto Finish;
02357     forwarding_entry = ccn_forwarding_entry_parse(req, req_size);
02358     if (forwarding_entry == NULL || forwarding_entry->action == NULL)
02359         goto Finish;
02360     if (selfreg) {
02361         if (strcmp(forwarding_entry->action, "selfreg") != 0)
02362             goto Finish;
02363         if (forwarding_entry->faceid == CCN_NOFACEID)
02364             forwarding_entry->faceid = h->interest_faceid;
02365         else if (forwarding_entry->faceid != h->interest_faceid)
02366             goto Finish;
02367     }
02368     else {
02369         if (strcmp(forwarding_entry->action, "prefixreg") != 0)
02370         goto Finish;
02371     }
02372     if (forwarding_entry->name_prefix == NULL)
02373         goto Finish;
02374     if (forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size == sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) {
02375         if (memcmp(forwarding_entry->ccnd_id,
02376                    h->ccnd_id, sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) != 0)
02377             goto Finish;
02378     }
02379     else if (forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size != 0)
02380         goto Finish;
02381     face = face_from_faceid(h, forwarding_entry->faceid);
02382     if (face == NULL)
02383         goto Finish;
02384     /* consider the source ... */
02385     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
02386     if (reqface == NULL)
02387         goto Finish;
02388     if ((reqface->flags & (CCN_FACE_GG | CCN_FACE_REGOK)) == 0)
02389         goto Finish;
02390     if (forwarding_entry->lifetime < 0)
02391         forwarding_entry->lifetime = 60;
02392     else if (forwarding_entry->lifetime > 3600 &&
02393              forwarding_entry->lifetime < (1 << 30))
02394         forwarding_entry->lifetime = 300;
02395     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02396     res = ccn_name_split(forwarding_entry->name_prefix, comps);
02397     if (res < 0)
02398         goto Finish;
02399     res = ccnd_reg_prefix(h,
02400                           forwarding_entry->name_prefix->buf, comps, res,
02401                           face->faceid,
02402                           forwarding_entry->flags,
02403                           forwarding_entry->lifetime);
02404     if (res < 0)
02405         goto Finish;
02406     forwarding_entry->flags = res;
02407     result = ccn_charbuf_create();
02408     forwarding_entry->action = NULL;
02409     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
02410     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
02411     res = ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(result, forwarding_entry);
02412     if (res < 0)
02413         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&result);
02414 Finish:
02415     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&forwarding_entry);
02416     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
02417     return(result);
02418 }
02419 
02420 /**
02421  * @brief Process a prefixreg request for the ccnd internal client.
02422  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02423  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
02424  *          ForwardingEntry in its Content.
02425  * @param size is its size in bytes
02426  * @result on success the returned charbuf holds a new ccnd-encoded
02427  *         ForwardingEntry;
02428  *         returns NULL for any error.
02429  */
02430 struct ccn_charbuf *
02431 ccnd_req_prefixreg(struct ccnd_handle *h, const unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
02432 {
02433     return(ccnd_req_prefix_or_self_reg(h, msg, size, 0));
02434 }
02435 
02436 /**
02437  * @brief Process a selfreg request for the ccnd internal client.
02438  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02439  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
02440  *          ForwardingEntry in its Content.
02441  * @param size is its size in bytes
02442  * @result on success the returned charbuf holds a new ccnd-encoded
02443  *         ForwardingEntry;
02444  *         returns NULL for any error.
02445  */
02446 struct ccn_charbuf *
02447 ccnd_req_selfreg(struct ccnd_handle *h, const unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
02448 {
02449     return(ccnd_req_prefix_or_self_reg(h, msg, size, 1));
02450 }
02451 
02452 /**
02453  * @brief Process an unreg request for the ccnd internal client.
02454  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02455  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
02456  *          ForwardingEntry in its Content.
02457  * @param size is its size in bytes
02458  * @result on success the returned charbuf holds a new ccnd-encoded
02459  *         ForwardingEntry;
02460  *         returns NULL for any error.
02461  */
02462 struct ccn_charbuf *
02463 ccnd_req_unreg(struct ccnd_handle *h, const unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
02464 {
02465     struct ccn_charbuf *result = NULL;
02466     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02467     int n_name_comp = 0;
02468     int res;
02469     const unsigned char *req;
02470     size_t req_size;
02471     size_t start;
02472     size_t stop;
02473     int found;
02474     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry = NULL;
02475     struct face *face = NULL;
02476     struct face *reqface = NULL;
02477     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = NULL;
02478     struct ccn_forwarding **p = NULL;
02479     struct ccn_forwarding *f = NULL;
02480     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
02481     
02482     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
02483     if (res < 0)
02484         goto Finish;        
02485     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
02486     if (res < 0)
02487         goto Finish;
02488     forwarding_entry = ccn_forwarding_entry_parse(req, req_size);
02489     if (forwarding_entry == NULL || forwarding_entry->action == NULL)
02490         goto Finish;
02491     if (strcmp(forwarding_entry->action, "unreg") != 0)
02492         goto Finish;
02493     if (forwarding_entry->faceid == CCN_NOFACEID)
02494         goto Finish;
02495     if (forwarding_entry->name_prefix == NULL)
02496         goto Finish;
02497     // XXX - probably ccnd_id should be mandatory.
02498     if (forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size == sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) {
02499         if (memcmp(forwarding_entry->ccnd_id,
02500                    h->ccnd_id, sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) != 0)
02501             goto Finish;
02502     }
02503     else if (forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size != 0)
02504         goto Finish;
02505     face = face_from_faceid(h, forwarding_entry->faceid);
02506     if (face == NULL)
02507         goto Finish;
02508     /* consider the source ... */
02509     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
02510     if (reqface == NULL || (reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0)
02511         goto Finish;
02512     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02513     n_name_comp = ccn_name_split(forwarding_entry->name_prefix, comps);
02514     if (n_name_comp < 0)
02515         goto Finish;
02516     if (n_name_comp + 1 > comps->n)
02517         goto Finish;
02518     start = comps->buf[0];
02519     stop = comps->buf[n_name_comp];
02520     npe = hashtb_lookup(h->nameprefix_tab,
02521                         forwarding_entry->name_prefix->buf + start,
02522                         stop - start);
02523     if (npe == NULL)
02524         goto Finish;
02525     found = 0;
02526     p = &npe->forwarding;
02527     for (f = npe->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next) {
02528         if (f->faceid == forwarding_entry->faceid) {
02529             found = 1;
02530             if (h->debug & (2 | 4))
02531                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_unreg", face,
02532                                 forwarding_entry->name_prefix->buf,
02533                                 forwarding_entry->name_prefix->length);
02534             *p = f->next;
02535             free(f);
02536             f = NULL;
02537             h->forward_to_gen += 1;
02538             break;
02539         }
02540         p = &(f->next);
02541     }
02542     if (!found) 
02543         goto Finish;    
02544     result = ccn_charbuf_create();
02545     forwarding_entry->action = NULL;
02546     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
02547     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
02548     res = ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(result, forwarding_entry);
02549     if (res < 0)
02550         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&result);
02551 Finish:
02552     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&forwarding_entry);
02553     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
02554     return(result);
02555 }
02556 
02557 /**
02558  * Recompute the contents of npe->forward_to and npe->flags
02559  * from forwarding lists of npe and all of its ancestors.
02560  */
02561 static void
02562 update_forward_to(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct nameprefix_entry *npe)
02563 {
02564     struct ccn_indexbuf *x = NULL;
02565     struct ccn_indexbuf *tap = NULL;
02566     struct ccn_forwarding *f = NULL;
02567     struct nameprefix_entry *p = NULL;
02568     unsigned wantflags;
02569     unsigned moreflags;
02570     unsigned lastfaceid;
02571     unsigned namespace_flags;
02572 
02573     x = npe->forward_to;
02574     if (x == NULL)
02575         npe->forward_to = x = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02576     else
02577         x->n = 0;
02578     wantflags = CCN_FORW_ACTIVE;
02579     lastfaceid = CCN_NOFACEID;
02580     namespace_flags = 0;
02581     for (p = npe; p != NULL; p = p->parent) {
02582         moreflags = CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT;
02583         for (f = p->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next) {
02584             if ((f->flags & wantflags) == wantflags &&
02585                   face_from_faceid(h, f->faceid) != NULL) {
02586                 namespace_flags |= f->flags;
02587                 if (h->debug & 32)
02588                     ccnd_msg(h, "fwd.%d adding %u", __LINE__, f->faceid);
02589                 ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(x, f->faceid);
02590                 if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_TAP) != 0) {
02591                     if (tap == NULL)
02592                         tap = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02593                     ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(tap, f->faceid);
02594                 }
02595                 if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_LAST) != 0)
02596                     lastfaceid = f->faceid;
02597             }
02598             if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_CAPTURE) != 0)
02599                 moreflags |= CCN_FORW_LAST;
02600         }
02601         wantflags |= moreflags;
02602     }
02603     if (lastfaceid != CCN_NOFACEID)
02604         ccn_indexbuf_move_to_end(x, lastfaceid);
02605     npe->flags = namespace_flags;
02606     npe->fgen = h->forward_to_gen;
02607     if (x->n == 0)
02608         ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&npe->forward_to);
02609     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&npe->tap);
02610     npe->tap = tap;
02611 }
02612 
02613 /**
02614  * This is where we consult the interest forwarding table.
02615  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02616  * @param from is the handle for the originating face (may be NULL).
02617  * @param msg points to the ccnb-encoded interest message
02618  * @param pi must be the parse information for msg
02619  * @param npe should be the result of the prefix lookup
02620  * @result Newly allocated set of outgoing faceids (never NULL)
02621  */
02622 static struct ccn_indexbuf *
02623 get_outbound_faces(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02624     struct face *from,
02625     unsigned char *msg,
02626     struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
02627     struct nameprefix_entry *npe)
02628 {
02629     int checkmask = 0;
02630     struct ccn_indexbuf *x;
02631     struct face *face;
02632     int i;
02633     int n;
02634     unsigned faceid;
02635     
02636     while (npe->parent != NULL && npe->forwarding == NULL)
02637         npe = npe->parent;
02638     if (npe->fgen != h->forward_to_gen)
02639         update_forward_to(h, npe);
02640     x = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02641     if (pi->scope == 0 || npe->forward_to == NULL || npe->forward_to->n == 0)
02642         return(x);
02643     if ((npe->flags & CCN_FORW_LOCAL) != 0)
02644         checkmask = (from != NULL && (from->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) != 0) ? CCN_FACE_GG : (~0);
02645     else if (pi->scope == 1)
02646         checkmask = CCN_FACE_GG;
02647     else if (pi->scope == 2)
02648         checkmask = from ? (CCN_FACE_GG & ~(from->flags)) : ~0;
02649     for (n = npe->forward_to->n, i = 0; i < n; i++) {
02650         faceid = npe->forward_to->buf[i];
02651         face = face_from_faceid(h, faceid);
02652         if (face != NULL && face != from &&
02653             ((face->flags & checkmask) == checkmask)) {
02654             if (h->debug & 32)
02655                 ccnd_msg(h, "outbound.%d adding %u", __LINE__, face->faceid);
02656             ccn_indexbuf_append_element(x, face->faceid);
02657         }
02658     }
02659     return(x);
02660 }
02661 
02662 static int
02663 pe_next_usec(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02664              struct propagating_entry *pe, int next_delay, int lineno)
02665 {
02666     if (next_delay > pe->usec)
02667         next_delay = pe->usec;
02668     pe->usec -= next_delay;
02669     if (h->debug & 32) {
02670         struct ccn_charbuf *c = ccn_charbuf_create();
02671         ccn_charbuf_putf(c, "%p.%dof%d,usec=%d+%d",
02672                          (void *)pe,
02673                          pe->sent,
02674                          pe->outbound ? pe->outbound->n : -1,
02675                          next_delay, pe->usec);
02676         if (pe->interest_msg != NULL) {
02677             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, lineno, ccn_charbuf_as_string(c),
02678                             face_from_faceid(h, pe->faceid),
02679                             pe->interest_msg, pe->size);
02680         }
02681         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&c);
02682     }
02683     return(next_delay);
02684 }
02685 
02686 static void replan_propagation(struct ccnd_handle *, struct propagating_entry *);
02687 
02688 static int
02689 do_propagate(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
02690              void *clienth,
02691              struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
02692              int flags)
02693 {
02694     struct ccnd_handle *h = clienth;
02695     struct propagating_entry *pe = ev->evdata;
02696     (void)(sched);
02697     int next_delay = 1;
02698     int special_delay = 0;
02699     if (pe->interest_msg == NULL)
02700         return(0);
02701     if (flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) {
02702         consume(h, pe);
02703         return(0);
02704     }
02705     if ((pe->flags & CCN_PR_WAIT1) != 0) {
02706         pe->flags &= ~CCN_PR_WAIT1;
02707         adjust_predicted_response(h, pe, 1);
02708     }
02709     if (pe->usec <= 0) {
02710         if (h->debug & 2)
02711             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_expiry",
02712                             face_from_faceid(h, pe->faceid),
02713                             pe->interest_msg, pe->size);
02714         consume(h, pe);
02715         reap_needed(h, 0);
02716         return(0);        
02717     }
02718     if ((pe->flags & CCN_PR_STUFFED1) != 0) {
02719         pe->flags &= ~CCN_PR_STUFFED1;
02720         pe->flags |= CCN_PR_WAIT1;
02721         next_delay = special_delay = ev->evint;
02722     }
02723     else if (pe->outbound != NULL && pe->sent < pe->outbound->n) {
02724         unsigned faceid = pe->outbound->buf[pe->sent];
02725         struct face *face = face_from_faceid(h, faceid);
02726         if (face != NULL && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_NOSEND) == 0) {
02727             if (h->debug & 2)
02728                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_to", face,
02729                                 pe->interest_msg, pe->size);
02730             pe->sent++;
02731             h->interests_sent += 1;
02732             h->interest_faceid = pe->faceid;
02733             next_delay = nrand48(h->seed) % 8192 + 500;
02734             if (((pe->flags & CCN_PR_TAP) != 0) &&
02735                   ccn_indexbuf_member(nameprefix_for_pe(h, pe)->tap, pe->faceid)) {
02736                 next_delay = special_delay = 1;
02737             }
02738             else if ((pe->flags & CCN_PR_UNSENT) != 0) {
02739                 pe->flags &= ~CCN_PR_UNSENT;
02740                 pe->flags |= CCN_PR_WAIT1;
02741                 next_delay = special_delay = ev->evint;
02742             }
02743             stuff_and_send(h, face, pe->interest_msg, pe->size);
02744         }
02745         else
02746             ccn_indexbuf_remove_first_match(pe->outbound, faceid);
02747     }
02748     /* The internal client may have already consumed the interest */
02749     if (pe->outbound == NULL)
02750         next_delay = CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC;
02751     else if (pe->sent == pe->outbound->n) {
02752         if (pe->usec <= CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC / 4)
02753             next_delay = CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC;
02754         else if (special_delay == 0)
02755             next_delay = CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC / 16;
02756         if (pe->fgen != h->forward_to_gen)
02757             replan_propagation(h, pe);
02758     }
02759     else {
02760         unsigned faceid = pe->outbound->buf[pe->sent];
02761         struct face *face = face_from_faceid(h, faceid);
02762         /* Wait longer before sending interest to ccndc */
02763         if (face != NULL && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_DC) != 0)
02764             next_delay += 60000;
02765     }
02766     next_delay = pe_next_usec(h, pe, next_delay, __LINE__);
02767     return(next_delay);
02768 }
02769 
02770 /**
02771  * Adjust the outbound face list for a new Interest, based upon 
02772  * existing similar interests.
02773  * @result besides possibly updating the outbound set, returns
02774  *         an extra delay time before propagation.  A negative return value
02775  *         indicates the interest should be dropped.
02776  */
02777 // XXX - rearrange to allow dummied-up "sent" entries.
02778 // XXX - subtle point - when similar interests are present in the PIT, and a new dest appears due to prefix registration, only one of the set should get sent to the new dest.
02779 static int
02780 adjust_outbound_for_existing_interests(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
02781                                        unsigned char *msg,
02782                                        struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
02783                                        struct nameprefix_entry *npe,
02784                                        struct ccn_indexbuf *outbound)
02785 {
02786     struct propagating_entry *head = &npe->pe_head;
02787     struct propagating_entry *p;
02788     size_t presize = pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce];
02789     size_t postsize = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce];
02790     size_t minsize = presize + postsize;
02791     unsigned char *post = msg + pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce];
02792     int k = 0;
02793     int max_redundant = 3; /* Allow this many dups from same face */
02794     int i;
02795     int n;
02796     struct face *otherface;
02797     int extra_delay = 0;
02798 
02799     if ((face->flags & (CCN_FACE_MCAST | CCN_FACE_LINK)) != 0)
02800         max_redundant = 0;
02801     if (outbound != NULL) {
02802         for (p = head->next; p != head && outbound->n > 0; p = p->next) {
02803             if (p->size > minsize &&
02804                 p->interest_msg != NULL &&
02805                 p->usec > 0 &&
02806                 0 == memcmp(msg, p->interest_msg, presize) &&
02807                 0 == memcmp(post, p->interest_msg + p->size - postsize, postsize)) {
02808                 /* Matches everything but the Nonce */
02809                 if (h->debug & 32)
02810                     ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "similar_interest",
02811                                     face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid),
02812                                     p->interest_msg, p->size);
02813                 if (face->faceid == p->faceid) {
02814                     /*
02815                      * This is one we've already seen before from the same face,
02816                      * but dropping it unconditionally would lose resiliency
02817                      * against dropped packets. Thus allow a few of them.
02818                      * Add some delay, though.
02819                      * XXX c.f. bug #13
02820                      */
02821                     extra_delay += npe->usec + 20000;
02822                     if ((++k) < max_redundant)
02823                         continue;
02824                     outbound->n = 0;
02825                     return(-1);
02826                 }
02827                 /*
02828                  * The existing interest from another face will serve for us,
02829                  * but we still need to send this interest there or we
02830                  * could miss an answer from that direction. Note that
02831                  * interests from two other faces could conspire to cover
02832                  * this one completely as far as propagation is concerned,
02833                  * but it is still necessary to keep it around for the sake
02834                  * or returning content.
02835                  * This assumes a unicast link.  If there are multiple
02836                  * parties on this face (broadcast or multicast), we
02837                  * do not want to send right away, because it is highly likely
02838                  * that we've seen an interest that one of the other parties
02839                  * is going to answer, and we'll see the answer, too.
02840                  */
02841                 otherface = face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid);
02842                 if (otherface == NULL)
02843                     continue;
02844                 /*
02845                  * If scope is 2, we can't treat these as similar if
02846                  * they did not originate on the same host
02847                  */
02848                 if (pi->scope == 2 &&
02849                     ((otherface->flags ^ face->flags) & CCN_FACE_GG) != 0)
02850                     continue;
02851                 n = outbound->n;
02852                 outbound->n = 0;
02853                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
02854                     if (p->faceid == outbound->buf[i]) {
02855                         outbound->buf[0] = p->faceid;
02856                         outbound->n = 1;
02857                         if ((otherface->flags & (CCN_FACE_MCAST | CCN_FACE_LINK)) != 0)
02858                             extra_delay += npe->usec + 10000;
02859                         break;
02860                     }
02861                 }
02862                 p->flags |= CCN_PR_EQV; /* Don't add new faces */
02863             }
02864         }
02865     }
02866     return(extra_delay);
02867 }
02868 
02869 static void
02870 ccnd_append_debug_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face, struct ccn_charbuf *cb) {
02871         unsigned char s[12];
02872         int i;
02873         
02874         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
02875             s[i] = h->ccnd_id[i];
02876         s[i++] = h->logpid >> 8;
02877         s[i++] = h->logpid;
02878         s[i++] = face->faceid >> 8;
02879         s[i++] = face->faceid;
02880         s[i++] = h->sec;
02881         s[i++] = h->usec * 256 / 1000000;
02882         for (; i < sizeof(s); i++)
02883             s[i] = nrand48(h->seed);
02884         ccnb_append_tagged_blob(cb, CCN_DTAG_Nonce, s, i);
02885 }
02886 
02887 static void
02888 ccnd_append_plain_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face, struct ccn_charbuf *cb) {
02889         int noncebytes = 6;
02890         unsigned char *s = NULL;
02891         int i;
02892         
02893         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Nonce, CCN_DTAG);
02894         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, noncebytes, CCN_BLOB);
02895         s = ccn_charbuf_reserve(cb, noncebytes);
02896         for (i = 0; i < noncebytes; i++)
02897             s[i] = nrand48(h->seed) >> i;
02898         cb->length += noncebytes;
02899         ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb);
02900 }
02901 
02902 /**
02903  * Schedules the propagation of an Interest message.
02904  */
02905 static int
02906 propagate_interest(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02907                    struct face *face,
02908                    unsigned char *msg,
02909                    struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
02910                    struct nameprefix_entry *npe)
02911 {
02912     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02913     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02914     unsigned char *nonce;
02915     size_t noncesize;
02916     struct ccn_charbuf *cb = NULL;
02917     int res;
02918     struct propagating_entry *pe = NULL;
02919     unsigned char *msg_out = msg;
02920     size_t msg_out_size = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E];
02921     int usec;
02922     int ntap;
02923     int delaymask;
02924     int extra_delay = 0;
02925     struct ccn_indexbuf *outbound = NULL;
02926     intmax_t lifetime;
02927     
02928     lifetime = ccn_interest_lifetime(msg, pi);
02929     outbound = get_outbound_faces(h, face, msg, pi, npe);
02930     if (outbound->n != 0) {
02931         extra_delay = adjust_outbound_for_existing_interests(h, face, msg, pi, npe, outbound);
02932         if (extra_delay < 0) {
02933             /*
02934              * Completely subsumed by other interests.
02935              * We do not have to worry about generating a nonce if it
02936              * does not have one yet.
02937              */ 
02938             if (h->debug & 16)
02939                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_subsumed", face,
02940                                 msg_out, msg_out_size);
02941             h->interests_dropped += 1;
02942             ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&outbound);
02943             return(0);
02944         }
02945     }
02946     if (pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce] == pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce]) {
02947         /* This interest has no nonce; add one before going on */
02948         size_t nonce_start = 0;
02949         cb = charbuf_obtain(h);
02950         ccn_charbuf_append(cb, msg, pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce]);
02951         nonce_start = cb->length;
02952         (h->appnonce)(h, face, cb);
02953         noncesize = cb->length - nonce_start;
02954         ccn_charbuf_append(cb, msg + pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_OTHER],
02955                                pi->offset[CCN_PI_E] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_OTHER]);
02956         nonce = cb->buf + nonce_start;
02957         msg_out = cb->buf;
02958         msg_out_size = cb->length;
02959     }
02960     else {
02961         nonce = msg + pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce];
02962         noncesize = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce];
02963     }
02964     hashtb_start(h->propagating_tab, e);
02965     res = hashtb_seek(e, nonce, noncesize, 0);
02966     pe = e->data;
02967     if (pe != NULL && pe->interest_msg == NULL) {
02968         unsigned char *m;
02969         m = calloc(1, msg_out_size);
02970         if (m == NULL) {
02971             res = -1;
02972             pe = NULL;
02973             hashtb_delete(e);
02974         }
02975         else {
02976             memcpy(m, msg_out, msg_out_size);
02977             pe->interest_msg = m;
02978             pe->size = msg_out_size;
02979             pe->faceid = face->faceid;
02980             face->pending_interests += 1;
02981             if (lifetime < INT_MAX / (1000000 >> 6) * (4096 >> 6))
02982                 pe->usec = lifetime * (1000000 >> 6) / (4096 >> 6);
02983             else
02984                 pe->usec = INT_MAX;
02985             delaymask = 0xFFF;
02986             pe->sent = 0;            
02987             pe->outbound = outbound;
02988             pe->flags = 0;
02989             if (pi->scope == 0)
02990                 pe->flags |= CCN_PR_SCOPE0;
02991             else if (pi->scope == 1)
02992                 pe->flags |= CCN_PR_SCOPE1;
02993             else if (pi->scope == 2)
02994                 pe->flags |= CCN_PR_SCOPE2;
02995             pe->fgen = h->forward_to_gen;
02996             link_propagating_interest_to_nameprefix(h, pe, npe);
02997             ntap = reorder_outbound_using_history(h, npe, pe);
02998             if (outbound->n > ntap &&
02999                   outbound->buf[ntap] == npe->src &&
03000                   extra_delay == 0) {
03001                 pe->flags = CCN_PR_UNSENT;
03002                 delaymask = 0xFF;
03003             }
03004             outbound = NULL;
03005             res = 0;
03006             if (ntap > 0)
03007                 (usec = 1, pe->flags |= CCN_PR_TAP);
03008             else
03009                 usec = (nrand48(h->seed) & delaymask) + 1 + extra_delay;
03010             usec = pe_next_usec(h, pe, usec, __LINE__);
03011             ccn_schedule_event(h->sched, usec, do_propagate, pe, npe->usec);
03012         }
03013     }
03014     else {
03015         ccnd_msg(h, "Interesting - this shouldn't happen much - ccnd.c:%d", __LINE__);
03016         /* We must have duplicated an existing nonce, or ENOMEM. */
03017         res = -1;
03018     }
03019     hashtb_end(e);
03020     if (cb != NULL)
03021         charbuf_release(h, cb);
03022     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&outbound);
03023     return(res);
03024 }
03025 
03026 static struct nameprefix_entry *
03027 nameprefix_for_pe(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct propagating_entry *pe)
03028 {
03029     struct nameprefix_entry *npe;
03030     struct propagating_entry *p;
03031     
03032     /* If any significant time is spent here, a direct link is possible, but costs space. */
03033     for (p = pe->next; p->faceid != CCN_NOFACEID; p = p->next)
03034         continue;
03035     npe = (void *)(((char *)p) - offsetof(struct nameprefix_entry, pe_head));
03036     return(npe);
03037 }
03038 
03039 static void
03040 replan_propagation(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct propagating_entry *pe)
03041 {
03042     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
03043     struct ccn_indexbuf *x = pe->outbound;
03044     struct face *face = NULL;
03045     struct face *from = NULL;
03046     int i;
03047     int k;
03048     int n;
03049     unsigned faceid;
03050     unsigned checkmask = 0;
03051     
03052     pe->fgen = h->forward_to_gen;
03053     if ((pe->flags & (CCN_PR_SCOPE0 | CCN_PR_EQV)) != 0)
03054         return;
03055     from = face_from_faceid(h, pe->faceid);
03056     if (from == NULL)
03057         return;
03058     npe = nameprefix_for_pe(h, pe);
03059     while (npe->parent != NULL && npe->forwarding == NULL)
03060         npe = npe->parent;
03061     if (npe->fgen != h->forward_to_gen)
03062         update_forward_to(h, npe);
03063     if (npe->forward_to == NULL || npe->forward_to->n == 0)
03064         return;
03065     if ((pe->flags & CCN_PR_SCOPE1) != 0)
03066         checkmask = CCN_FACE_GG;
03067     if ((pe->flags & CCN_PR_SCOPE2) != 0)
03068         checkmask = CCN_FACE_GG & ~(from->flags);
03069     if ((npe->flags & CCN_FORW_LOCAL) != 0)
03070         checkmask = ((from->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) != 0) ? CCN_FACE_GG : (~0);
03071     for (n = npe->forward_to->n, i = 0; i < n; i++) {
03072         faceid = npe->forward_to->buf[i];
03073         face = face_from_faceid(h, faceid);
03074         if (face != NULL && faceid != pe->faceid &&
03075             ((face->flags & checkmask) == checkmask)) {
03076             k = x->n;
03077             ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(x, faceid);
03078             if (x->n > k && (h->debug & 32) != 0)
03079                 ccnd_msg(h, "at %d adding %u", __LINE__, faceid);
03080         }
03081     }
03082     // XXX - should account for similar interests, history, etc.
03083 }
03084 
03085 /**
03086  * Checks whether this Interest message has been seen before by using
03087  * its Nonce, recording it in the process.  Also, if it has been
03088  * seen and the original is still propagating, remove the face that
03089  * the duplicate arrived on from the outbound set of the original.
03090  */
03091 static int
03092 is_duplicate_flooded(struct ccnd_handle *h, unsigned char *msg,
03093                      struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi, unsigned faceid)
03094 {
03095     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
03096     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
03097     struct propagating_entry *pe = NULL;
03098     int res;
03099     size_t nonce_start = pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce];
03100     size_t nonce_size = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce] - nonce_start;
03101     if (nonce_size == 0)
03102         return(0);
03103     hashtb_start(h->propagating_tab, e);
03104     res = hashtb_seek(e, msg + nonce_start, nonce_size, 0);
03105     if (res == HT_OLD_ENTRY) {
03106         pe = e->data;
03107         if (promote_outbound(pe, faceid) != -1)
03108             pe->sent++;
03109     }
03110     hashtb_end(e);
03111     return(res == HT_OLD_ENTRY);
03112 }
03113 
03114 /**
03115  * Finds the longest matching nameprefix, returns the component count or -1 for error.
03116  */
03117 /* UNUSED */ int
03118 nameprefix_longest_match(struct ccnd_handle *h, const unsigned char *msg,
03119                          struct ccn_indexbuf *comps, int ncomps)
03120 {
03121     int i;
03122     int base;
03123     int answer = 0;
03124     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
03125 
03126     if (ncomps + 1 > comps->n)
03127         return(-1);
03128     base = comps->buf[0];
03129     for (i = 0; i <= ncomps; i++) {
03130         npe = hashtb_lookup(h->nameprefix_tab, msg + base, comps->buf[i] - base);
03131         if (npe == NULL)
03132             break;
03133         answer = i;
03134         if (npe->children == 0)
03135             break;
03136     }
03137     ccnd_msg(h, "nameprefix_longest_match returning %d", answer);
03138     return(answer);
03139 }
03140 
03141 /**
03142  * Creates a nameprefix entry if it does not already exist, together
03143  * with all of its parents.
03144  */
03145 static int
03146 nameprefix_seek(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct hashtb_enumerator *e,
03147                 const unsigned char *msg, struct ccn_indexbuf *comps, int ncomps)
03148 {
03149     int i;
03150     int base;
03151     int res = -1;
03152     struct nameprefix_entry *parent = NULL;
03153     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
03154     struct propagating_entry *head = NULL;
03155 
03156     if (ncomps + 1 > comps->n)
03157         return(-1);
03158     base = comps->buf[0];
03159     for (i = 0; i <= ncomps; i++) {
03160         res = hashtb_seek(e, msg + base, comps->buf[i] - base, 0);
03161         if (res < 0)
03162             break;
03163         npe = e->data;
03164         if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY) {
03165             head = &npe->pe_head;
03166             head->next = head;
03167             head->prev = head;
03168             head->faceid = CCN_NOFACEID;
03169             npe->parent = parent;
03170             npe->forwarding = NULL;
03171             npe->fgen = h->forward_to_gen - 1;
03172             npe->forward_to = NULL;
03173             if (parent != NULL) {
03174                 parent->children++;
03175                 npe->flags = parent->flags;
03176                 npe->src = parent->src;
03177                 npe->osrc = parent->osrc;
03178                 npe->usec = parent->usec;
03179             }
03180             else {
03181                 npe->src = npe->osrc = CCN_NOFACEID;
03182                 npe->usec = (nrand48(h->seed) % 4096U) + 8192;
03183             }
03184         }
03185         parent = npe;
03186     }
03187     return(res);
03188 }
03189 
03190 static struct content_entry *
03191 next_child_at_level(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03192                     struct content_entry *content, int level)
03193 {
03194     struct content_entry *next = NULL;
03195     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
03196     struct ccn_indexbuf *pred[CCN_SKIPLIST_MAX_DEPTH] = {NULL};
03197     int d;
03198     int res;
03199     
03200     if (content == NULL)
03201         return(NULL);
03202     if (content->ncomps <= level + 1)
03203         return(NULL);
03204     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
03205     ccn_name_init(name);
03206     res = ccn_name_append_components(name, content->key,
03207                                      content->comps[0],
03208                                      content->comps[level + 1]);
03209     if (res < 0) abort();
03210     res = ccn_name_next_sibling(name);
03211     if (res < 0) abort();
03212     if (h->debug & 8)
03213         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "child_successor", NULL,
03214                         name->buf, name->length);
03215     d = content_skiplist_findbefore(h, name->buf, name->length,
03216                                     NULL, pred);
03217     next = content_from_accession(h, pred[0]->buf[0]);
03218     if (next == content) {
03219         // XXX - I think this case should not occur, but just in case, avoid a loop.
03220         next = content_from_accession(h, content_skiplist_next(h, content));
03221         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "bump", NULL, next->key, next->size);
03222     }
03223     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
03224     return(next);
03225 }
03226 
03227 static void
03228 process_incoming_interest(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
03229                           unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
03230 {
03231     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
03232     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
03233     struct ccn_parsed_interest parsed_interest = {0};
03234     struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi = &parsed_interest;
03235     size_t namesize = 0;
03236     int k;
03237     int res;
03238     int try;
03239     int matched;
03240     int s_ok;
03241     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
03242     struct content_entry *content = NULL;
03243     struct content_entry *last_match = NULL;
03244     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = indexbuf_obtain(h);
03245     if (size > 65535)
03246         res = -__LINE__;
03247     else
03248         res = ccn_parse_interest(msg, size, pi, comps);
03249     if (res < 0) {
03250         ccnd_msg(h, "error parsing Interest - code %d", res);
03251     }
03252     else if (pi->scope >= 0 && pi->scope < 2 &&
03253              (face->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) {
03254         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_outofscope", face, msg, size);
03255         h->interests_dropped += 1;
03256     }
03257     else if (is_duplicate_flooded(h, msg, pi, face->faceid)) {
03258         if (h->debug & 16)
03259              ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_dup", face, msg, size);
03260         h->interests_dropped += 1;
03261     }
03262     else {
03263         if (h->debug & (16 | 8 | 2))
03264             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_from", face, msg, size);
03265         if (h->debug & 16)
03266             ccnd_msg(h,
03267                      "version: %d, "
03268                      "prefix_comps: %d, "
03269                      "min_suffix_comps: %d, "
03270                      "max_suffix_comps: %d, "
03271                      "orderpref: %d, "
03272                      "answerfrom: %d, "
03273                      "scope: %d, "
03274                      "lifetime: %d.%04d, "
03275                      "excl: %d bytes, "
03276                      "etc: %d bytes",
03277                      pi->magic,
03278                      pi->prefix_comps,
03279                      pi->min_suffix_comps,
03280                      pi->max_suffix_comps,
03281                      pi->orderpref, pi->answerfrom, pi->scope,
03282                      ccn_interest_lifetime_seconds(msg, pi),
03283                      (int)(ccn_interest_lifetime(msg, pi) & 0xFFF) * 10000 / 4096,
03284                      pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Exclude] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude],
03285                      pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_OTHER] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_OTHER]);
03286         if (pi->magic < 20090701) {
03287             if (++(h->oldformatinterests) == h->oldformatinterestgrumble) {
03288                 h->oldformatinterestgrumble *= 2;
03289                 ccnd_msg(h, "downrev interests received: %d (%d)",
03290                          h->oldformatinterests,
03291                          pi->magic);
03292             }
03293         }
03294         namesize = comps->buf[pi->prefix_comps] - comps->buf[0];
03295         h->interests_accepted += 1;
03296         s_ok = (pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_STALE) != 0;
03297         matched = 0;
03298         hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
03299         res = nameprefix_seek(h, e, msg, comps, pi->prefix_comps);
03300         npe = e->data;
03301         if (npe == NULL)
03302             goto Bail;
03303         if ((npe->flags & CCN_FORW_LOCAL) != 0 &&
03304             (face->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) {
03305             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_nonlocal", face, msg, size);
03306             h->interests_dropped += 1;
03307             goto Bail;
03308         }
03309         if ((pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_CS) != 0) {
03310             last_match = NULL;
03311             content = find_first_match_candidate(h, msg, pi);
03312             if (content != NULL && (h->debug & 8))
03313                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "first_candidate", NULL,
03314                                 content->key,
03315                                 content->size);
03316             if (content != NULL &&
03317                 !content_matches_interest_prefix(h, content, msg, comps, 
03318                                                  pi->prefix_comps)) {
03319                 if (h->debug & 8)
03320                     ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_mismatch", NULL,
03321                                     msg, size);
03322                 content = NULL;
03323             }
03324             for (try = 0; content != NULL; try++) {
03325                 if ((s_ok || (content->flags & CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE) == 0) &&
03326                     ccn_content_matches_interest(content->key,
03327                                        content->size,
03328                                        0, NULL, msg, size, pi)) {
03329                     if ((pi->orderpref & 1) == 0 && // XXX - should be symbolic
03330                         pi->prefix_comps != comps->n - 1 &&
03331                         comps->n == content->ncomps &&
03332                         content_matches_interest_prefix(h, content, msg,
03333                                                         comps, comps->n - 1)) {
03334                         if (h->debug & 8)
03335                             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "skip_match", NULL,
03336                                             content->key,
03337                                             content->size);
03338                         goto move_along;
03339                     }
03340                     if (h->debug & 8)
03341                         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "matches", NULL, 
03342                                         content->key,
03343                                         content->size);
03344                     if ((pi->orderpref & 1) == 0) // XXX - should be symbolic
03345                         break;
03346                     last_match = content;
03347                     content = next_child_at_level(h, content, comps->n - 1);
03348                     goto check_next_prefix;
03349                 }
03350             move_along:
03351                 content = content_from_accession(h, content_skiplist_next(h, content));
03352             check_next_prefix:
03353                 if (content != NULL &&
03354                     !content_matches_interest_prefix(h, content, msg, 
03355                                                      comps, pi->prefix_comps)) {
03356                     if (h->debug & 8)
03357                         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_mismatch", NULL,
03358                                         content->key, 
03359                                         content->size);
03360                     content = NULL;
03361                 }
03362             }
03363             if (last_match != NULL)
03364                 content = last_match;
03365             if (content != NULL) {
03366                 /* Check to see if we are planning to send already */
03367                 enum cq_delay_class c;
03368                 for (c = 0, k = -1; c < CCN_CQ_N && k == -1; c++)
03369                     if (face->q[c] != NULL)
03370                         k = ccn_indexbuf_member(face->q[c]->send_queue, content->accession);
03371                 if (k == -1) {
03372                     k = face_send_queue_insert(h, face, content);
03373                     if (k >= 0) {
03374                         if (h->debug & (32 | 8))
03375                             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "consume", face, msg, size);
03376                     }
03377                     /* Any other matched interests need to be consumed, too. */
03378                     match_interests(h, content, NULL, face, NULL);
03379                 }
03380                 if ((pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_EXPIRE) != 0)
03381                     mark_stale(h, content);
03382                 matched = 1;
03383             }
03384         }
03385         if (!matched && pi->scope != 0 && npe != NULL)
03386             propagate_interest(h, face, msg, pi, npe);
03387     Bail:
03388         hashtb_end(e);
03389     }
03390     indexbuf_release(h, comps);
03391 }
03392 
03393 /**
03394  * Mark content as stale
03395  */
03396 static void
03397 mark_stale(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct content_entry *content)
03398 {
03399     ccn_accession_t accession = content->accession;
03400     if ((content->flags & CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE) != 0)
03401         return;
03402     if (h->debug & 4)
03403             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "stale", NULL,
03404                             content->key, content->size);
03405     content->flags |= CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE;
03406     h->n_stale++;
03407     if (accession < h->min_stale)
03408         h->min_stale = accession;
03409     if (accession > h->max_stale)
03410         h->max_stale = accession;
03411 }
03412 
03413 /**
03414  * Scheduled event that makes content stale when its FreshnessSeconds
03415  * has exported.
03416  *
03417  * May actually remove the content if we are over quota.
03418  */
03419 static int
03420 expire_content(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
03421                void *clienth,
03422                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
03423                int flags)
03424 {
03425     struct ccnd_handle *h = clienth;
03426     ccn_accession_t accession = ev->evint;
03427     struct content_entry *content = NULL;
03428     int res;
03429     unsigned n;
03430     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0)
03431         return(0);
03432     content = content_from_accession(h, accession);
03433     if (content != NULL) {
03434         n = hashtb_n(h->content_tab);
03435         /* The fancy test here lets existing stale content go away, too. */
03436         if ((n - (n >> 3)) > h->capacity ||
03437             (n > h->capacity && h->min_stale > h->max_stale)) {
03438             res = remove_content(h, content);
03439             if (res == 0)
03440                 return(0);
03441         }
03442         mark_stale(h, content);
03443     }
03444     return(0);
03445 }
03446 
03447 /**
03448  * Schedules content expiration based on its FreshnessSeconds.
03449  *
03450  */
03451 static void
03452 set_content_timer(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct content_entry *content,
03453                   struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pco)
03454 {
03455     int seconds = 0;
03456     int microseconds = 0;
03457     size_t start = pco->offset[CCN_PCO_B_FreshnessSeconds];
03458     size_t stop  = pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E_FreshnessSeconds];
03459     if (h->force_zero_freshness) {
03460         /* Keep around for long enough to make it through the queues */
03461         microseconds = 8 * h->data_pause_microsec + 10000;
03462         goto Finish;
03463     }
03464     if (start == stop)
03465         return;
03466     seconds = ccn_fetch_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(
03467                 CCN_DTAG_FreshnessSeconds,
03468                 content->key,
03469                 start, stop);
03470     if (seconds <= 0)
03471         return;
03472     if (seconds > ((1U<<31) / 1000000)) {
03473         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "FreshnessSeconds_too_large", NULL,
03474             content->key, pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E]);
03475         return;
03476     }
03477     microseconds = seconds * 1000000;
03478 Finish:
03479     ccn_schedule_event(h->sched, microseconds,
03480                        &expire_content, NULL, content->accession);
03481 }
03482 
03483 static void
03484 process_incoming_content(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
03485                          unsigned char *wire_msg, size_t wire_size)
03486 {
03487     unsigned char *msg;
03488     size_t size;
03489     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
03490     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
03491     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject obj = {0};
03492     int res;
03493     size_t keysize = 0;
03494     size_t tailsize = 0;
03495     unsigned char *tail = NULL;
03496     struct content_entry *content = NULL;
03497     int i;
03498     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = indexbuf_obtain(h);
03499     struct ccn_charbuf *cb = charbuf_obtain(h);
03500     
03501     msg = wire_msg;
03502     size = wire_size;
03503     
03504     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &obj, comps);
03505     if (res < 0) {
03506         ccnd_msg(h, "error parsing ContentObject - code %d", res);
03507         goto Bail;
03508     }
03509     if (comps->n < 1 ||
03510         (keysize = comps->buf[comps->n - 1]) > 65535 - 36) {
03511         ccnd_msg(h, "ContentObject with keysize %lu discarded",
03512                  (unsigned long)keysize);
03513         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "oversize", face, msg, size);
03514         res = -__LINE__;
03515         goto Bail;
03516     }
03517     /* Make the ContentObject-digest name component explicit */
03518     ccn_digest_ContentObject(msg, &obj);
03519     if (obj.digest_bytes != 32) {
03520         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "indigestible", face, msg, size);
03521         goto Bail;
03522     }
03523     i = comps->buf[comps->n - 1];
03524     ccn_charbuf_append(cb, msg, i);
03525     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Component, CCN_DTAG);
03526     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, obj.digest_bytes, CCN_BLOB);
03527     ccn_charbuf_append(cb, obj.digest, obj.digest_bytes);
03528     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb);
03529     ccn_charbuf_append(cb, msg + i, size - i);
03530     msg = cb->buf;
03531     size = cb->length;
03532     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &obj, comps);
03533     if (res < 0) abort(); /* must have just messed up */
03534     
03535     if (obj.magic != 20090415) {
03536         if (++(h->oldformatcontent) == h->oldformatcontentgrumble) {
03537             h->oldformatcontentgrumble *= 10;
03538             ccnd_msg(h, "downrev content items received: %d (%d)",
03539                      h->oldformatcontent,
03540                      obj.magic);
03541         }
03542     }
03543     if (h->debug & 4)
03544         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "content_from", face, msg, size);
03545     keysize = obj.offset[CCN_PCO_B_Content];
03546     tail = msg + keysize;
03547     tailsize = size - keysize;
03548     hashtb_start(h->content_tab, e);
03549     res = hashtb_seek(e, msg, keysize, tailsize);
03550     content = e->data;
03551     if (res == HT_OLD_ENTRY) {
03552         if (tailsize != e->extsize ||
03553               0 != memcmp(tail, ((unsigned char *)e->key) + keysize, tailsize)) {
03554             ccnd_msg(h, "ContentObject name collision!!!!!");
03555             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "new", face, msg, size);
03556             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "old", NULL, e->key, e->keysize + e->extsize);
03557             content = NULL;
03558             hashtb_delete(e); /* XXX - Mercilessly throw away both of them. */
03559             res = -__LINE__;
03560         }
03561         else if ((content->flags & CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE) != 0) {
03562             /* When old content arrives after it has gone stale, freshen it */
03563             // XXX - ought to do mischief checks before this
03564             content->flags &= ~CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE;
03565             h->n_stale--;
03566             set_content_timer(h, content, &obj);
03567             // XXX - no counter for this case
03568         }
03569         else {
03570             h->content_dups_recvd++;
03571             ccnd_msg(h, "received duplicate ContentObject from %u (accession %llu)",
03572                      face->faceid, (unsigned long long)content->accession);
03573             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "dup", face, msg, size);
03574         }
03575     }
03576     else if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY) {
03577         content->accession = ++(h->accession);
03578         enroll_content(h, content);
03579         if (content == content_from_accession(h, content->accession)) {
03580             content->ncomps = comps->n;
03581             content->comps = calloc(comps->n, sizeof(comps[0]));
03582         }
03583         content->key_size = e->keysize;
03584         content->size = e->keysize + e->extsize;
03585         content->key = e->key;
03586         if (content->comps != NULL) {
03587             for (i = 0; i < comps->n; i++)
03588                 content->comps[i] = comps->buf[i];
03589             content_skiplist_insert(h, content);
03590             set_content_timer(h, content, &obj);
03591         }
03592         else {
03593             ccnd_msg(h, "could not enroll ContentObject (accession %llu)",
03594                 (unsigned long long)content->accession);
03595             hashtb_delete(e);
03596             res = -__LINE__;
03597             content = NULL;
03598         }
03599         /* Mark public keys supplied at startup as precious. */
03600         if (obj.type == CCN_CONTENT_KEY && content->accession <= (h->capacity + 7)/8)
03601             content->flags |= CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_PRECIOUS;
03602     }
03603     hashtb_end(e);
03604 Bail:
03605     indexbuf_release(h, comps);
03606     charbuf_release(h, cb);
03607     cb = NULL;
03608     if (res >= 0 && content != NULL) {
03609         int n_matches;
03610         enum cq_delay_class c;
03611         struct content_queue *q;
03612         n_matches = match_interests(h, content, &obj, NULL, face);
03613         if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY) {
03614             if (n_matches < 0) {
03615                 remove_content(h, content);
03616                 return;
03617             }
03618             if (n_matches == 0 && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) {
03619                 content->flags |= CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_SLOWSEND;
03620                 ccn_indexbuf_append_element(h->unsol, content->accession);
03621             }
03622         }
03623         for (c = 0; c < CCN_CQ_N; c++) {
03624             q = face->q[c];
03625             if (q != NULL) {
03626                 i = ccn_indexbuf_member(q->send_queue, content->accession);
03627                 if (i >= 0) {
03628                     /*
03629                      * In the case this consumed any interests from this source,
03630                      * don't send the content back
03631                      */
03632                     if (h->debug & 8)
03633                         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "content_nosend", face, msg, size);
03634                     q->send_queue->buf[i] = 0;
03635                 }
03636             }
03637         }
03638     }
03639 }
03640 
03641 static void
03642 process_input_message(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
03643                       unsigned char *msg, size_t size, int pdu_ok)
03644 {
03645     struct ccn_skeleton_decoder decoder = {0};
03646     struct ccn_skeleton_decoder *d = &decoder;
03647     ssize_t dres;
03648     
03649     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED) != 0) {
03650         face->flags &= ~CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED;
03651         if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_LOOPBACK) != 0)
03652             face->flags |= CCN_FACE_GG;
03653         register_new_face(h, face);
03654     }
03655     d->state |= CCN_DSTATE_PAUSE;
03656     dres = ccn_skeleton_decode(d, msg, size);
03657     if (d->state >= 0 && CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->state) == CCN_DTAG) {
03658         if (pdu_ok && d->numval == CCN_DTAG_CCNProtocolDataUnit) {
03659             size -= d->index;
03660             if (size > 0)
03661                 size--;
03662             msg += d->index;
03663             face->flags |= CCN_FACE_LINK;
03664             face->flags &= ~CCN_FACE_GG;
03665             memset(d, 0, sizeof(*d));
03666             while (d->index < size) {
03667                 dres = ccn_skeleton_decode(d, msg + d->index, size - d->index);
03668                 if (d->state != 0)
03669                     break;
03670                 /* The pdu_ok parameter limits the recursion depth */
03671                 process_input_message(h, face, msg + d->index - dres, dres, 0);
03672             }
03673             return;
03674         }
03675         else if (d->numval == CCN_DTAG_Interest) {
03676             process_incoming_interest(h, face, msg, size);
03677             return;
03678         }
03679         else if (d->numval == CCN_DTAG_ContentObject) {
03680             process_incoming_content(h, face, msg, size);
03681             return;
03682         }
03683     }
03684     ccnd_msg(h, "discarding unknown message; size = %lu", (unsigned long)size);
03685 }
03686 
03687 static void
03688 ccnd_new_face_msg(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face)
03689 {
03690     const struct sockaddr *addr = face->addr;
03691     int port = 0;
03692     const unsigned char *rawaddr = NULL;
03693     char printable[80];
03694     const char *peer = NULL;
03695     if (addr->sa_family == AF_INET6) {
03696         const struct sockaddr_in6 *addr6 = (struct sockaddr_in6 *)addr;
03697         rawaddr = (const unsigned char *)&addr6->sin6_addr;
03698         port = htons(addr6->sin6_port);
03699     }
03700     else if (addr->sa_family == AF_INET) {
03701         const struct sockaddr_in *addr4 = (struct sockaddr_in *)addr;
03702         rawaddr = (const unsigned char *)&addr4->sin_addr.s_addr;
03703         port = htons(addr4->sin_port);
03704     }
03705     if (rawaddr != NULL)
03706         peer = inet_ntop(addr->sa_family, rawaddr, printable, sizeof(printable));
03707     if (peer == NULL)
03708         peer = "(unknown)";
03709     ccnd_msg(h,
03710              "accepted datagram client id=%d (flags=0x%x) %s port %d",
03711              face->faceid, face->flags, peer, port);
03712 }
03713 
03714 static struct face *
03715 get_dgram_source(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
03716            struct sockaddr *addr, socklen_t addrlen, int why)
03717 {
03718     struct face *source = NULL;
03719     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
03720     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
03721     int res;
03722     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_DGRAM) == 0)
03723         return(face);
03724     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_MCAST) != 0)
03725         return(face);
03726     hashtb_start(h->dgram_faces, e);
03727     res = hashtb_seek(e, addr, addrlen, 0);
03728     if (res >= 0) {
03729         source = e->data;
03730         source->recvcount++;
03731         if (source->addr == NULL) {
03732             source->addr = e->key;
03733             source->addrlen = e->keysize;
03734             source->recv_fd = face->recv_fd;
03735             source->sendface = face->faceid;
03736             init_face_flags(h, source, CCN_FACE_DGRAM);
03737             if (why == 1 && (source->flags & CCN_FACE_LOOPBACK) != 0)
03738                 source->flags |= CCN_FACE_GG;
03739             res = enroll_face(h, source);
03740             if (res == -1) {
03741                 hashtb_delete(e);
03742                 source = NULL;
03743             }
03744             else {
03745                 ccnd_new_face_msg(h, source);
03746                 reap_needed(h, CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC);
03747             }
03748         }
03749     }
03750     hashtb_end(e);
03751     return(source);
03752 }
03753 
03754 static void
03755 process_input_buffer(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face)
03756 {
03757     unsigned char *msg;
03758     size_t size;
03759     ssize_t dres;
03760     struct ccn_skeleton_decoder *d;
03761 
03762     if (face == NULL || face->inbuf == NULL)
03763         return;
03764     d = &face->decoder;
03765     msg = face->inbuf->buf;
03766     size = face->inbuf->length;
03767     while (d->index < size) {
03768         dres = ccn_skeleton_decode(d, msg + d->index, size - d->index);
03769         if (d->state != 0)
03770             break;
03771         process_input_message(h, face, msg + d->index - dres, dres, 0);
03772     }
03773     if (d->index != size) {
03774         ccnd_msg(h, "protocol error on face %u (state %d), discarding %d bytes",
03775                      face->faceid, d->state, (int)(size - d->index));
03776         
03777     }
03778     face->inbuf->length = 0;
03779     memset(d, 0, sizeof(*d));
03780 }
03781 
03782 static void
03783 process_input(struct ccnd_handle *h, int fd)
03784 {
03785     struct face *face = NULL;
03786     struct face *source = NULL;
03787     ssize_t res;
03788     ssize_t dres;
03789     ssize_t msgstart;
03790     unsigned char *buf;
03791     struct ccn_skeleton_decoder *d;
03792     struct sockaddr_storage sstor;
03793     socklen_t addrlen = sizeof(sstor);
03794     struct sockaddr *addr = (struct sockaddr *)&sstor;
03795     int err = 0;
03796     socklen_t err_sz;
03797     
03798     face = hashtb_lookup(h->faces_by_fd, &fd, sizeof(fd));
03799     if (face == NULL)
03800         return;
03801     if ((face->flags & (CCN_FACE_DGRAM | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE)) == CCN_FACE_PASSIVE) {
03802         accept_connection(h, fd);
03803         check_comm_file(h);
03804         return;
03805     }
03806     err_sz = sizeof(err);
03807     res = getsockopt(face->recv_fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_ERROR, &err, &err_sz);
03808     if (res >= 0 && err != 0) {
03809         ccnd_msg(h, "error on face %u: %s (%d)", face->faceid, strerror(err), err);
03810         if (err == ETIMEDOUT && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_CONNECTING) != 0) {
03811             shutdown_client_fd(h, fd);
03812             return;
03813         }
03814     }
03815     d = &face->decoder;
03816     if (face->inbuf == NULL)
03817         face->inbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
03818     if (face->inbuf->length == 0)
03819         memset(d, 0, sizeof(*d));
03820     buf = ccn_charbuf_reserve(face->inbuf, 8800);
03821     res = recvfrom(face->recv_fd, buf, face->inbuf->limit - face->inbuf->length,
03822             /* flags */ 0, addr, &addrlen);
03823     if (res == -1)
03824         ccnd_msg(h, "recvfrom face %u :%s (errno = %d)",
03825                     face->faceid, strerror(errno), errno);
03826     else if (res == 0 && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_DGRAM) == 0)
03827         shutdown_client_fd(h, fd);
03828     else {
03829         source = get_dgram_source(h, face, addr, addrlen, (res == 1) ? 1 : 2);
03830         source->recvcount++;
03831         source->surplus = 0;
03832         if (res <= 1 && (source->flags & CCN_FACE_DGRAM) != 0) {
03833             if (h->debug & 128)
03834                 ccnd_msg(h, "%d-byte heartbeat on %d", (int)res, source->faceid);
03835             return;
03836         }
03837         face->inbuf->length += res;
03838         msgstart = 0;
03839         if (((face->flags & CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED) != 0 &&
03840              face->inbuf->length >= 6 &&
03841              0 == memcmp(face->inbuf->buf, "GET ", 4))) {
03842             ccnd_stats_handle_http_connection(h, face);
03843             return;
03844         }
03845         dres = ccn_skeleton_decode(d, buf, res);
03846         while (d->state == 0) {
03847             process_input_message(h, source,
03848                                   face->inbuf->buf + msgstart, 
03849                                   d->index - msgstart,
03850                                   (face->flags & CCN_FACE_LOCAL) != 0);
03851             msgstart = d->index;
03852             if (msgstart == face->inbuf->length) {
03853                 face->inbuf->length = 0;
03854                 return;
03855             }
03856             dres = ccn_skeleton_decode(d,
03857                     face->inbuf->buf + d->index,
03858                     res = face->inbuf->length - d->index);
03859         }
03860         if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_DGRAM) != 0) {
03861             ccnd_msg(h, "protocol error on face %u, discarding %u bytes",
03862                 source->faceid,
03863                 (unsigned)(face->inbuf->length));
03864             face->inbuf->length = 0;
03865             /* XXX - should probably ignore this source for a while */
03866             return;
03867         }
03868         else if (d->state < 0) {
03869             ccnd_msg(h, "protocol error on face %u", source->faceid);
03870             shutdown_client_fd(h, fd);
03871             return;
03872         }
03873         if (msgstart < face->inbuf->length && msgstart > 0) {
03874             /* move partial message to start of buffer */
03875             memmove(face->inbuf->buf, face->inbuf->buf + msgstart,
03876                 face->inbuf->length - msgstart);
03877             face->inbuf->length -= msgstart;
03878             d->index -= msgstart;
03879         }
03880     }
03881 }
03882 
03883 static void
03884 process_internal_client_buffer(struct ccnd_handle *h)
03885 {
03886     struct face *face = h->face0;
03887     if (face == NULL)
03888         return;
03889     face->inbuf = ccn_grab_buffered_output(h->internal_client);
03890     if (face->inbuf == NULL)
03891         return;
03892     process_input_buffer(h, face);
03893     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&(face->inbuf));
03894 }
03895 
03896 /**
03897  * Handle errors after send() or sendto().
03898  * @returns -1 if error has been dealt with, or 0 to defer sending.
03899  */
03900 static int
03901 handle_send_error(struct ccnd_handle *h, int errnum, struct face *face,
03902                   const void *data, size_t size)
03903 {
03904     int res = -1;
03905     if (errnum == EAGAIN) {
03906         res = 0;
03907     }
03908     else if (errnum == EPIPE) {
03909         face->flags |= CCN_FACE_NOSEND;
03910         face->outbufindex = 0;
03911         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&face->outbuf);
03912     }
03913     else {
03914         ccnd_msg(h, "send to face %u failed: %s (errno = %d)",
03915                  face->faceid, strerror(errnum), errnum);
03916         if (errnum == EISCONN)
03917             res = 0;
03918     }
03919     return(res);
03920 }
03921 
03922 static int
03923 sending_fd(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face)
03924 {
03925     struct face *out = NULL;
03926     if (face->sendface == face->faceid)
03927         return(face->recv_fd);
03928     out = face_from_faceid(h, face->sendface);
03929     if (out != NULL)
03930         return(out->recv_fd);
03931     face->sendface = CCN_NOFACEID;
03932     if (face->addr != NULL) {
03933         switch (face->addr->sa_family) {
03934             case AF_INET:
03935                 face->sendface = h->ipv4_faceid;
03936                 break;
03937             case AF_INET6:
03938                 face->sendface = h->ipv6_faceid;
03939                 break;
03940             default:
03941                 break;
03942         }
03943     }
03944     out = face_from_faceid(h, face->sendface);
03945     if (out != NULL)
03946         return(out->recv_fd);
03947     return(-1);
03948 }
03949 
03950 /**
03951  * Send data to the face.
03952  *
03953  * No direct error result is provided; the face state is updated as needed.
03954  */
03955 void
03956 ccnd_send(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03957           struct face *face,
03958           const void *data, size_t size)
03959 {
03960     ssize_t res;
03961     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_NOSEND) != 0)
03962         return;
03963     face->surplus++;
03964     if (face->outbuf != NULL) {
03965         ccn_charbuf_append(face->outbuf, data, size);
03966         return;
03967     }
03968     if (face == h->face0) {
03969         ccn_dispatch_message(h->internal_client, (void *)data, size);
03970         process_internal_client_buffer(h);
03971         return;
03972     }
03973     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_DGRAM) == 0)
03974         res = send(face->recv_fd, data, size, 0);
03975     else
03976         res = sendto(sending_fd(h, face), data, size, 0,
03977                      face->addr, face->addrlen);
03978     if (res == size)
03979         return;
03980     if (res == -1) {
03981         res = handle_send_error(h, errno, face, data, size);
03982         if (res == -1)
03983             return;
03984     }
03985     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_DGRAM) != 0) {
03986         ccnd_msg(h, "sendto short");
03987         return;
03988     }
03989     face->outbufindex = 0;
03990     face->outbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
03991     if (face->outbuf == NULL) {
03992         ccnd_msg(h, "do_write: %s", strerror(errno));
03993         return;
03994     }
03995     ccn_charbuf_append(face->outbuf,
03996                        ((const unsigned char *)data) + res, size - res);
03997 }
03998 
03999 static void
04000 do_deferred_write(struct ccnd_handle *h, int fd)
04001 {
04002     /* This only happens on connected sockets */
04003     ssize_t res;
04004     struct face *face = hashtb_lookup(h->faces_by_fd, &fd, sizeof(fd));
04005     if (face == NULL)
04006         return;
04007     if (face->outbuf != NULL) {
04008         ssize_t sendlen = face->outbuf->length - face->outbufindex;
04009         if (sendlen > 0) {
04010             res = send(fd, face->outbuf->buf + face->outbufindex, sendlen, 0);
04011             if (res == -1) {
04012                 if (errno == EPIPE) {
04013                     face->flags |= CCN_FACE_NOSEND;
04014                     face->outbufindex = 0;
04015                     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&face->outbuf);
04016                     return;
04017                 }
04018                 ccnd_msg(h, "send: %s (errno = %d)", strerror(errno), errno);
04019                 shutdown_client_fd(h, fd);
04020                 return;
04021             }
04022             if (res == sendlen) {
04023                 face->outbufindex = 0;
04024                 ccn_charbuf_destroy(&face->outbuf);
04025                 if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_CLOSING) != 0)
04026                     shutdown_client_fd(h, fd);
04027                 return;
04028             }
04029             face->outbufindex += res;
04030             return;
04031         }
04032         face->outbufindex = 0;
04033         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&face->outbuf);
04034     }
04035     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_CLOSING) != 0)
04036         shutdown_client_fd(h, fd);
04037     else if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_CONNECTING) != 0)
04038         face->flags &= ~CCN_FACE_CONNECTING;
04039     else
04040         ccnd_msg(h, "ccnd:do_deferred_write: something fishy on %d", fd);
04041 }
04042 
04043 /**
04044  * Set up the array of fd descriptors for the poll(2) call.
04045  *
04046  * Arrange the array so that multicast receivers are early, so that
04047  * if the same packet arrives on both a multicast socket and a 
04048  * normal socket, we will count is as multicast.
04049  */
04050 static void
04051 prepare_poll_fds(struct ccnd_handle *h)
04052 {
04053     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
04054     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
04055     int i, j, k;
04056     if (hashtb_n(h->faces_by_fd) != h->nfds) {
04057         h->nfds = hashtb_n(h->faces_by_fd);
04058         h->fds = realloc(h->fds, h->nfds * sizeof(h->fds[0]));
04059         memset(h->fds, 0, h->nfds * sizeof(h->fds[0]));
04060     }
04061     for (i = 0, k = h->nfds, hashtb_start(h->faces_by_fd, e);
04062          i < k && e->data != NULL; hashtb_next(e)) {
04063         struct face *face = e->data;
04064         if (face->flags & CCN_FACE_MCAST)
04065             j = i++;
04066         else
04067             j = --k;
04068         h->fds[j].fd = face->recv_fd;
04069         h->fds[j].events = ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_NORECV) == 0) ? POLLIN : 0;
04070         if ((face->outbuf != NULL || (face->flags & CCN_FACE_CLOSING) != 0))
04071             h->fds[j].events |= POLLOUT;
04072     }
04073     hashtb_end(e);
04074     if (i < k)
04075         abort();
04076 }
04077 
04078 /**
04079  * Run the main loop of the ccnd
04080  */
04081 void
04082 ccnd_run(struct ccnd_handle *h)
04083 {
04084     int i;
04085     int res;
04086     int timeout_ms = -1;
04087     int prev_timeout_ms = -1;
04088     int usec;
04089     for (h->running = 1; h->running;) {
04090         process_internal_client_buffer(h);
04091         usec = ccn_schedule_run(h->sched);
04092         timeout_ms = (usec < 0) ? -1 : ((usec + 960) / 1000);
04093         if (timeout_ms == 0 && prev_timeout_ms == 0)
04094             timeout_ms = 1;
04095         process_internal_client_buffer(h);
04096         prepare_poll_fds(h);
04097         if (0) ccnd_msg(h, "at ccnd.c:%d poll(h->fds, %d, %d)", __LINE__, h->nfds, timeout_ms);
04098         res = poll(h->fds, h->nfds, timeout_ms);
04099         prev_timeout_ms = ((res == 0) ? timeout_ms : 1);
04100         if (-1 == res) {
04101             ccnd_msg(h, "poll: %s (errno = %d)", strerror(errno), errno);
04102             sleep(1);
04103             continue;
04104         }
04105         for (i = 0; res > 0 && i < h->nfds; i++) {
04106             if (h->fds[i].revents != 0) {
04107                 res--;
04108                 if (h->fds[i].revents & (POLLERR | POLLNVAL | POLLHUP)) {
04109                     if (h->fds[i].revents & (POLLIN))
04110                         process_input(h, h->fds[i].fd);
04111                     else
04112                         shutdown_client_fd(h, h->fds[i].fd);
04113                     continue;
04114                 }
04115                 if (h->fds[i].revents & (POLLOUT))
04116                     do_deferred_write(h, h->fds[i].fd);
04117                 else if (h->fds[i].revents & (POLLIN))
04118                     process_input(h, h->fds[i].fd);
04119             }
04120         }
04121     }
04122 }
04123 
04124 static void
04125 ccnd_reseed(struct ccnd_handle *h)
04126 {
04127     int fd;
04128     ssize_t res;
04129     
04130     res = -1;
04131     fd = open("/dev/urandom", O_RDONLY);
04132     if (fd != -1) {
04133         res = read(fd, h->seed, sizeof(h->seed));
04134         close(fd);
04135     }
04136     if (res != sizeof(h->seed)) {
04137         h->seed[1] = (unsigned short)getpid(); /* better than no entropy */
04138         h->seed[2] = (unsigned short)time(NULL);
04139     }
04140     /*
04141      * The call to seed48 is needed by cygwin, and should be harmless
04142      * on other platforms.
04143      */
04144     seed48(h->seed);
04145 }
04146 
04147 static char *
04148 ccnd_get_local_sockname(void)
04149 {
04150     struct sockaddr_un sa;
04151     ccn_setup_sockaddr_un(NULL, &sa);
04152     return(strdup(sa.sun_path));
04153 }
04154 
04155 static void
04156 ccnd_gettime(const struct ccn_gettime *self, struct ccn_timeval *result)
04157 {
04158     struct ccnd_handle *h = self->data;
04159     struct timeval now = {0};
04160     gettimeofday(&now, 0);
04161     result->s = now.tv_sec;
04162     result->micros = now.tv_usec;
04163     h->sec = now.tv_sec;
04164     h->usec = now.tv_usec;
04165 }
