04166 
04167 void
04168 ccnd_setsockopt_v6only(struct ccnd_handle *h, int fd)
04169 {
04170     int yes = 1;
04171     int res = 0;
04172 #ifdef IPV6_V6ONLY
04173     res = setsockopt(fd, IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_V6ONLY, &yes, sizeof(yes));
04174 #endif
04175     if (res == -1)
04176         ccnd_msg(h, "warning - could not set IPV6_V6ONLY on fd %d: %s",
04177                  fd, strerror(errno));
04178 }
04179 
04180 static const char *
04181 af_name(int family)
04182 {
04183     switch (family) {
04184         case AF_INET:
04185             return("ipv4");
04186         case AF_INET6:
04187             return("ipv6");
04188         default:
04189             return("");
04190     }
04191 }
04192 
04193 static int
04194 ccnd_listen_on_wildcards(struct ccnd_handle *h)
04195 {
04196     int fd;
04197     int res;
04198     int whichpf;
04199     struct addrinfo hints = {0};
04200     struct addrinfo *addrinfo = NULL;
04201     struct addrinfo *a;
04202     
04203     hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_DGRAM;
04204     hints.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
04205     for (whichpf = 0; whichpf < 2; whichpf++) {
04206         hints.ai_family = whichpf ? PF_INET6 : PF_INET;
04207         res = getaddrinfo(NULL, h->portstr, &hints, &addrinfo);
04208         if (res == 0) {
04209             for (a = addrinfo; a != NULL; a = a->ai_next) {
04210                 fd = socket(a->ai_family, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
04211                 if (fd != -1) {
04212                     struct face *face = NULL;
04213                     int yes = 1;
04214                     int rcvbuf = 0;
04215                     socklen_t rcvbuf_sz;
04216                     setsockopt(fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &yes, sizeof(yes));
04217                     rcvbuf_sz = sizeof(rcvbuf);
04218                     getsockopt(fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, &rcvbuf, &rcvbuf_sz);
04219                     if (a->ai_family == AF_INET6)
04220                         ccnd_setsockopt_v6only(h, fd);
04221                     res = bind(fd, a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen);
04222                     if (res != 0) {
04223                         close(fd);
04224                         continue;
04225                     }
04226                     face = record_connection(h, fd,
04227                                              a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen,
04228                                              CCN_FACE_DGRAM | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE);
04229                     if (face == NULL) {
04230                         close(fd);
04231                         continue;
04232                     }
04233                     if (a->ai_family == AF_INET)
04234                         h->ipv4_faceid = face->faceid;
04235                     else
04236                         h->ipv6_faceid = face->faceid;
04237                     ccnd_msg(h, "accepting %s datagrams on fd %d rcvbuf %d",
04238                              af_name(a->ai_family), fd, rcvbuf);
04239                 }
04240             }
04241             for (a = addrinfo; a != NULL; a = a->ai_next) {
04242                 fd = socket(a->ai_family, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
04243                 if (fd != -1) {
04244                     int yes = 1;
04245                     setsockopt(fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &yes, sizeof(yes));
04246                     if (a->ai_family == AF_INET6)
04247                         ccnd_setsockopt_v6only(h, fd);
04248                     res = bind(fd, a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen);
04249                     if (res != 0) {
04250                         close(fd);
04251                         continue;
04252                     }
04253                     res = listen(fd, 30);
04254                     if (res == -1) {
04255                         close(fd);
04256                         continue;
04257                     }
04258                     record_connection(h, fd,
04259                                       a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen,
04260                                       CCN_FACE_PASSIVE);
04261                     ccnd_msg(h, "accepting %s connections on fd %d",
04262                              af_name(a->ai_family), fd);
04263                 }
04264             }
04265             freeaddrinfo(addrinfo);
04266         }
04267     }
04268     return(0);
04269 }
04270 
04271 static int
04272 ccnd_listen_on_address(struct ccnd_handle *h, const char *addr)
04273 {
04274     int fd;
04275     int res;
04276     struct addrinfo hints = {0};
04277     struct addrinfo *addrinfo = NULL;
04278     struct addrinfo *a;
04279     int ok = 0;
04280     
04281     ccnd_msg(h, "listen_on %s", addr);
04282     hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_DGRAM;
04283     hints.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
04284     res = getaddrinfo(addr, h->portstr, &hints, &addrinfo);
04285     if (res == 0) {
04286         for (a = addrinfo; a != NULL; a = a->ai_next) {
04287             fd = socket(a->ai_family, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
04288             if (fd != -1) {
04289                 struct face *face = NULL;
04290                 int yes = 1;
04291                 int rcvbuf = 0;
04292                 socklen_t rcvbuf_sz;
04293                 setsockopt(fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &yes, sizeof(yes));
04294                 rcvbuf_sz = sizeof(rcvbuf);
04295                 getsockopt(fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, &rcvbuf, &rcvbuf_sz);
04296                 if (a->ai_family == AF_INET6)
04297                     ccnd_setsockopt_v6only(h, fd);
04298                 res = bind(fd, a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen);
04299                 if (res != 0) {
04300                     close(fd);
04301                     continue;
04302                 }
04303                 face = record_connection(h, fd,
04304                                          a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen,
04305                                          CCN_FACE_DGRAM | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE);
04306                 if (face == NULL) {
04307                     close(fd);
04308                     continue;
04309                 }
04310                 if (a->ai_family == AF_INET)
04311                     h->ipv4_faceid = face->faceid;
04312                 else
04313                     h->ipv6_faceid = face->faceid;
04314                 ccnd_msg(h, "accepting %s datagrams on fd %d rcvbuf %d",
04315                              af_name(a->ai_family), fd, rcvbuf);
04316                 ok++;
04317             }
04318         }
04319         for (a = addrinfo; a != NULL; a = a->ai_next) {
04320             fd = socket(a->ai_family, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
04321             if (fd != -1) {
04322                 int yes = 1;
04323                 setsockopt(fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &yes, sizeof(yes));
04324                 if (a->ai_family == AF_INET6)
04325                     ccnd_setsockopt_v6only(h, fd);
04326                 res = bind(fd, a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen);
04327                 if (res != 0) {
04328                     close(fd);
04329                     continue;
04330                 }
04331                 res = listen(fd, 30);
04332                 if (res == -1) {
04333                     close(fd);
04334                     continue;
04335                 }
04336                 record_connection(h, fd,
04337                                   a->ai_addr, a->ai_addrlen,
04338                                   CCN_FACE_PASSIVE);
04339                 ccnd_msg(h, "accepting %s connections on fd %d",
04340                          af_name(a->ai_family), fd);
04341                 ok++;
04342             }
04343         }
04344         freeaddrinfo(addrinfo);
04345     }
04346     return(ok > 0 ? 0 : -1);
04347 }
04348 
04349 static int
04350 ccnd_listen_on(struct ccnd_handle *h, const char *addrs)
04351 {
04352     unsigned char ch;
04353     unsigned char dlm;
04354     int res = 0;
04355     int i;
04356     struct ccn_charbuf *addr = NULL;
04357     
04358     if (addrs == NULL || !*addrs || 0 == strcmp(addrs, "*"))
04359         return(ccnd_listen_on_wildcards(h));
04360     addr = ccn_charbuf_create();
04361     for (i = 0, ch = addrs[i]; addrs[i] != 0;) {
04362         addr->length = 0;
04363         dlm = 0;
04364         if (ch == '[') {
04365             dlm = ']';
04366             ch = addrs[++i];
04367         }
04368         for (; ch > ' ' && ch != ',' && ch != ';' && ch != dlm; ch = addrs[++i])
04369             ccn_charbuf_append_value(addr, ch, 1);
04370         if (ch && ch == dlm)
04371             ch = addrs[++i];
04372         if (addr->length > 0) {
04373             res |= ccnd_listen_on_address(h, ccn_charbuf_as_string(addr));
04374         }
04375         while ((0 < ch && ch <= ' ') || ch == ',' || ch == ';')
04376             ch = addrs[++i];
04377     }
04378     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&addr);
04379     return(res);
04380 }
04381 
04382 static struct ccn_charbuf *
04383 ccnd_parse_uri_list(struct ccnd_handle *h, const char *what, const char *uris)
04384 {
04385     struct ccn_charbuf *ans;
04386     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
04387     int i;
04388     size_t j;
04389     int res;
04390     unsigned char ch;
04391     const char *uri;
04392 
04393     if (uris == NULL)
04394         return(NULL);
04395     ans = ccn_charbuf_create();
04396     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
04397     for (i = 0, ch = uris[0]; ch != 0;) {
04398         while ((0 < ch && ch <= ' ') || ch == ',' || ch == ';')
04399             ch = uris[++i];
04400         j = ans->length;
04401         while (ch > ' ' && ch != ',' && ch != ';') {
04402             ccn_charbuf_append_value(ans, ch, 1);
04403             ch = uris[++i];
04404         }
04405         if (j < ans->length) {
04406             ccn_charbuf_append_value(ans, 0, 1);
04407             uri = (const char *)ans->buf + j;
04408             name->length = 0;
04409             res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, uri);
04410             if (res < 0) {
04411                 ccnd_msg(h, "%s: invalid ccnx URI: %s", what, uri);
04412                 ans->length = j;
04413             }
04414         }
04415     }
04416     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
04417     if (ans->length == 0)
04418         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ans);
04419     return(ans);
04420 }
04421 
04422 /**
04423  * Start a new ccnd instance
04424  * @param progname - name of program binary, used for locating helpers
04425  * @param logger - logger function
04426  * @param loggerdata - data to pass to logger function
04427  */
04428 struct ccnd_handle *
04429 ccnd_create(const char *progname, ccnd_logger logger, void *loggerdata)
04430 {
04431     char *sockname;
04432     const char *portstr;
04433     const char *debugstr;
04434     const char *entrylimit;
04435     const char *mtu;
04436     const char *data_pause;
04437     const char *autoreg;
04438     const char *listen_on;
04439     int fd;
04440     struct ccnd_handle *h;
04441     struct hashtb_param param = {0};
04442     
04443     sockname = ccnd_get_local_sockname();
04444     h = calloc(1, sizeof(*h));
04445     if (h == NULL)
04446         return(h);
04447     h->logger = logger;
04448     h->loggerdata = loggerdata;
04449     h->appnonce = &ccnd_append_plain_nonce;
04450     h->logpid = (int)getpid();
04451     h->progname = progname;
04452     h->debug = -1;
04453     h->skiplinks = ccn_indexbuf_create();
04454     param.finalize_data = h;
04455     h->face_limit = 1024; /* soft limit */
04456     h->faces_by_faceid = calloc(h->face_limit, sizeof(h->faces_by_faceid[0]));
04457     param.finalize = &finalize_face;
04458     h->faces_by_fd = hashtb_create(sizeof(struct face), &param);
04459     h->dgram_faces = hashtb_create(sizeof(struct face), &param);
04460     param.finalize = &finalize_content;
04461     h->content_tab = hashtb_create(sizeof(struct content_entry), &param);
04462     param.finalize = &finalize_nameprefix;
04463     h->nameprefix_tab = hashtb_create(sizeof(struct nameprefix_entry), &param);
04464     param.finalize = &finalize_propagating;
04465     h->propagating_tab = hashtb_create(sizeof(struct propagating_entry), &param);
04466     param.finalize = 0;
04467     h->sparse_straggler_tab = hashtb_create(sizeof(struct sparse_straggler_entry), NULL);
04468     h->min_stale = ~0;
04469     h->max_stale = 0;
04470     h->unsol = ccn_indexbuf_create();
04471     h->ticktock.descr[0] = 'C';
04472     h->ticktock.micros_per_base = 1000000;
04473     h->ticktock.gettime = &ccnd_gettime;
04474     h->ticktock.data = h;
04475     h->sched = ccn_schedule_create(h, &h->ticktock);
04476     h->oldformatcontentgrumble = 1;
04477     h->oldformatinterestgrumble = 1;
04478     h->data_pause_microsec = 10000;
04479     debugstr = getenv("CCND_DEBUG");
04480     if (debugstr != NULL && debugstr[0] != 0) {
04481         h->debug = atoi(debugstr);
04482         if (h->debug == 0 && debugstr[0] != '0')
04483             h->debug = 1;
04484     }
04485     else
04486         h->debug = 1;
04487     portstr = getenv(CCN_LOCAL_PORT_ENVNAME);
04488     if (portstr == NULL || portstr[0] == 0 || strlen(portstr) > 10)
04489         portstr = CCN_DEFAULT_UNICAST_PORT;
04490     h->portstr = portstr;
04491     entrylimit = getenv("CCND_CAP");
04492     h->capacity = ~0;
04493     if (entrylimit != NULL && entrylimit[0] != 0) {
04494         h->capacity = atol(entrylimit);
04495         if (h->capacity == 0)
04496             h->force_zero_freshness = 1;
04497         if (h->capacity <= 0)
04498             h->capacity = 10;
04499     }
04500     h->mtu = 0;
04501     mtu = getenv("CCND_MTU");
04502     if (mtu != NULL && mtu[0] != 0) {
04503         h->mtu = atol(mtu);
04504         if (h->mtu < 0)
04505             h->mtu = 0;
04506         if (h->mtu > 8800)
04507             h->mtu = 8800;
04508     }
04509     data_pause = getenv("CCND_DATA_PAUSE_MICROSEC");
04510     if (data_pause != NULL && data_pause[0] != 0) {
04511         h->data_pause_microsec = atol(data_pause);
04512         if (h->data_pause_microsec == 0)
04513             h->data_pause_microsec = 1;
04514         if (h->data_pause_microsec > 1000000)
04515             h->data_pause_microsec = 1000000;
04516     }
04517     listen_on = getenv("CCND_LISTEN_ON");
04518     autoreg = getenv("CCND_AUTOREG");
04519     ccnd_msg(h, "CCND_DEBUG=%d CCND_CAP=%lu", h->debug, h->capacity);
04520     if (autoreg != NULL && autoreg[0] != 0) {
04521         h->autoreg = ccnd_parse_uri_list(h, "CCND_AUTOREG", autoreg);
04522         if (h->autoreg != NULL)
04523             ccnd_msg(h, "CCND_AUTOREG=%s", autoreg);
04524     }
04525     if (listen_on != NULL && listen_on[0] != 0)
04526         ccnd_msg(h, "CCND_LISTEN_ON=%s", listen_on);
04527     // if (h->debug & 256)
04528         h->appnonce = &ccnd_append_debug_nonce;
04529     /* Do keystore setup early, it takes a while the first time */
04530     ccnd_init_internal_keystore(h);
04531     ccnd_reseed(h);
04532     if (h->face0 == NULL) {
04533         struct face *face;
04534         face = calloc(1, sizeof(*face));
04535         face->recv_fd = -1;
04536         face->sendface = 0;
04537         face->flags = (CCN_FACE_GG | CCN_FACE_LOCAL);
04538         h->face0 = face;
04539     }
04540     enroll_face(h, h->face0);
04541     fd = create_local_listener(h, sockname, 42);
04542     if (fd == -1)
04543         ccnd_msg(h, "%s: %s", sockname, strerror(errno));
04544     else
04545         ccnd_msg(h, "listening on %s", sockname);
04546     h->flood = (h->autoreg != NULL);
04547     h->ipv4_faceid = h->ipv6_faceid = CCN_NOFACEID;
04548     ccnd_listen_on(h, listen_on);
04549     clean_needed(h);
04550     age_forwarding_needed(h);
04551     ccnd_internal_client_start(h);
04552     free(sockname);
04553     sockname = NULL;
04554     return(h);
04555 }
04556 
04557 /**
04558  * Shutdown listeners and bound datagram sockets, leaving connected streams.
04559  */
04560 static void
04561 ccnd_shutdown_listeners(struct ccnd_handle *h)
04562 {
04563     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
04564     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
04565     for (hashtb_start(h->faces_by_fd, e); e->data != NULL;) {
04566         struct face *face = e->data;
04567         if ((face->flags & (CCN_FACE_MCAST | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE)) != 0)
04568             hashtb_delete(e);
04569         else
04570             hashtb_next(e);
04571     }
04572     hashtb_end(e);
04573 }
04574 
04575 /**
04576  * Destroy the ccnd instance, releasing all associated resources.
04577  */
04578 void
04579 ccnd_destroy(struct ccnd_handle **pccnd)
04580 {
04581     struct ccnd_handle *h = *pccnd;
04582     if (h == NULL)
04583         return;
04584     ccnd_shutdown_listeners(h);
04585     ccnd_internal_client_stop(h);
04586     ccn_schedule_destroy(&h->sched);
04587     hashtb_destroy(&h->dgram_faces);
04588     hashtb_destroy(&h->faces_by_fd);
04589     hashtb_destroy(&h->content_tab);
04590     hashtb_destroy(&h->propagating_tab);
04591     hashtb_destroy(&h->nameprefix_tab);
04592     hashtb_destroy(&h->sparse_straggler_tab);
04593     if (h->fds != NULL) {
04594         free(h->fds);
04595         h->fds = NULL;
04596         h->nfds = 0;
04597     }
04598     if (h->faces_by_faceid != NULL) {
04599         free(h->faces_by_faceid);
04600         h->faces_by_faceid = NULL;
04601         h->face_limit = h->face_gen = 0;
04602     }
04603     if (h->content_by_accession != NULL) {
04604         free(h->content_by_accession);
04605         h->content_by_accession = NULL;
04606         h->content_by_accession_window = 0;
04607     }
04608     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&h->scratch_charbuf);
04609     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&h->autoreg);
04610     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&h->skiplinks);
04611     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&h->scratch_indexbuf);
04612     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&h->unsol);
04613     if (h->face0 != NULL) {
04614         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&h->face0->inbuf);
04615         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&h->face0->outbuf);
04616         free(h->face0);
04617         h->face0 = NULL;
04618     }
04619     free(h);
04620     *pccnd = NULL;
04621 }
